Divine Assistance.quote: "Call upon Me in the day of trouble; I will deliver you, and you shall glorify Me." (Psalm 50:15)

Divine Grace.quote: "My grace is sufficient for you, for My power is made perfect in weakness." (2 Corinthians 12:9)

Divine Protection.quote: "Allah is the best guardian, and He is the most merciful of the merciful." (Quran 12:64)

Divine Guidance.quote: "I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go." (Psalm 32:8)

Divine Support.quote: "The Lord himself goes before you and will be with you." (Deuteronomy 31:8)

Divine Intervention.quote: "When dharma declines and adharma increases, I manifest myself." (Bhagavad Gita 4:7)

Divine Aid.quote: "Help comes from the Lord, who made heaven and earth." (Psalm 121:2)

Divine Mercy.quote: "In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful." (Quran 1:1)

Divine Comfort.quote: "As a mother comforts her child, so will I comfort you." (Isaiah 66:13)

Divine Blessing.quote: "I will bless you and make your name great." (Genesis 12:2)

Divine Providence.quote: "Your providence, O Father, steers all things." (Wisdom of Solomon 14:3)

Divine Care.quote: "Cast your burden on the Lord, and He will sustain you." (Psalm 55:22)

Divine Rescue.quote: "The Lord is my rock, my fortress and my deliverer." (Psalm 18:2)

Divine Healing.quote: "I am the Lord who heals you." (Exodus 15:26)

Divine Answer.quote: "Before they call I will answer, while they are still speaking I will hear." (Isaiah 65:24)

Divine Light.quote: "Lead me in your truth and teach me." (Psalm 25:5)

Divine Shield.quote: "The Lord is my shield, my glory, and the lifter of my head." (Psalm 3:3)

Divine Refuge.quote: "God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble." (Psalm 46:1)

Divine Strength.quote: "The joy of the Lord is your strength." (Nehemiah 8:10)

Divine Resources.quote: "My God shall supply all your needs according to His riches in glory." (Philippians 4:19)

Divine Presence.quote: "I am with you always, even to the end of the age." (Matthew 28:20)

Divine Empowerment.quote: "You will receive power when the Holy Spirit comes upon you." (Acts 1:8)

Divine Direction.quote: "Trust in the Lord with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding." (Proverbs 3:5)

Divine Support System.quote: "The eternal God is your refuge, and underneath are the everlasting arms." (Deuteronomy 33:27)

Divine Abundance.quote: "I have come that they may have life, and have it more abundantly." (John 10:10)

Divine Deliverance.quote: "The Lord knows how to rescue the godly from trials." (2 Peter 2:9)

Divine Assistance Methods.quote: "Ask and it will be given to you; seek and you will find; knock and the door will be opened to you." (Matthew 7:7)

Divine Help Process.quote: "In all your ways acknowledge Him, and He shall direct your paths." (Proverbs 3:6)

Divine Aid Systems.quote: "For He will command His angels concerning you to guard you in all your ways." (Psalm 91:11)
